reviews.Title: Decent product
reviews.Comment:
I Switched from Android to Iphone just for fun and see why people Hype it so much.
In few things definitely Iphone is way better than Samsung or other phones.
Pros :
1. Display
2. Video Recording and Photos are stunning
3. Battery backup is too good. But after few updates of ios18 I see it's draining a bit fast.
4. UI and navigation is fast
5. Audio output is surpassing Android phones which is a surprise to me :-D

Cons
1. Heavy and you know immediately once you take it to your hand
